name: reaction
title: Reaction Button
oneLiner: A simple reaction button with variants
documentation:
Provides a simple and elegant way for users to react to Nostr events. Supports multiple visual variants and displays real-time reaction counts.

## Features

- **Multiple Variants**: Choose from ghost, outline, pill, or solid styles
- **Customizable Emoji**: Use any emoji for reactions (defaults to ❤️)
- **Real-time Counts**: Shows live reaction counts that update automatically
- **Optimistic Updates**: Immediate visual feedback for better UX
- **Count Modes**: Display total reactions or count for specific emoji

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (optional if available in context)

props.name: countMode
props.description: Whether to show total count of all reactions or just count for the specific emoji
